item.description:
Its Sepetember. That means its time for "Oktoberfest". Yup. Octoberfest takes place in september. Why? I dont know.

Maybe another of those crazy european things :) Who cares?

What we care about is that it gives us yet another reason to enjoy beer. (As if we needed a reason..huh).

If you love your beer, you can't ignore oktoberfest.
Even if you dont love beer, its a great time to enjoy some German culture with the local blends, hangout with friends and make new ones.

The park plaza in downtown boston is hosting an oktober fest celebrations with a variety of beers.
(Thanks Devang)

Details at:

http://beersummit.com...

Lets check out the place on Friday and maybe we carry it over to saturday.

A $35 ticket gets you following:

Entrance all night (5 - 10pm) to the Friday VIP Preview (Sept. 11th, 2009)
A commemorative mug
4 Beers
table games
Great Music

Interested people would have to buy your own tickets from the site & then we could meet up at the venue.
item.name: Oktoberfest
